A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film was an atrocity. The good parts were the elements when there were no characters involved. It was CGI-porn for those who like star wars style ships.

Firstly\, there was an awful lot of air for space. Secondly\, there were a lot of moronic elements that weren't thought through. Plot lines that would have made a great story were cut off in favor of 50 shades of the force between Rae and Kylo.

It didn't build anything upon the star wars universe\, and could have be condensed into a 30 minute movie.
